channel.title: Xp Mode Reward system
channel.description:
[b]Hey everyone i added the xp modes you should find the tut anywhere on google
i wanted to add a reward system for exmaple you get a title with the option you choose? i have titles added in the server already?
what kinda line would i add to each option to do this?[/b]

item.title: Xp Mode Reward system
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Section Rules [READ OR GET PUNISHED] Last Updated: 7/23/11

3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

People seem to forget the rules of this website quite often…

What have you attempted to do this… Provide code… Provide information of your server.

Read full topic
